import React, { useRef, useState } from 'react' import './Share.css' import { PermMedia, Label, Room, EmojiEmotions } from '@material-ui/icons' import { useContext } from 'react' import { AuthContext } from '../../context/AuthContext' import axios from 'axios' export default function Share() { const { user } = useContext(AuthContext) const desc = useRef() const [file, setFile] = useState(null) const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDeafault() const newPost = { userId: user._id, desc: desc.current.value, } try { axios.post('/posts', newPost) } catch (err) { console.log(err) } } return (
